column4: Hey everyone - is there a quick way I can make it so that one user in a multi-user environment cannot use nautilus to move beyond their own home directory?
thanks, jcs - thought of that, and yeah, it might do, but doesn't that leave all the other system folders open too? If there's no quick way, your way would do though
could write a script to chmod em all fast :)
that might be the best way. I'll do that. Thanks.
